pages.name: Salesforce is cloud-based
pages.body: Salesforce is delivered entirely over the internet, so teams can access it from anywhere without installing software.

pages.name: CRM stands for Customer Relationship Management
pages.body: Salesforce is the world’s #1 CRM, helping businesses track leads, manage customers, and close deals faster.

pages.name: Salesforce automates workflows
pages.body: Repetitive tasks like sending emails, updating records, or approvals can be automated to save time.

pages.name: Dashboards show real-time data
pages.body: Salesforce dashboards let teams see live sales, service, or marketing metrics at a glance.

pages.name: AppExchange is like an app store
pages.body: Businesses can install thousands of apps from the Salesforce AppExchange to extend functionality.

pages.name: Salesforce integrates with email
pages.body: You can connect Salesforce with Gmail, Outlook, and other tools to log conversations directly.

pages.name: Einstein AI powers insights
pages.body: Salesforce Einstein uses AI to predict sales, recommend next steps, and personalize customer experiences.

pages.name: Salesforce supports mobile
pages.body: The Salesforce mobile app gives sales and service teams full CRM access from their phones.

pages.name: Trailhead teaches Salesforce
pages.body: Salesforce offers a free online learning platform called Trailhead to upskill users and admins.

pages.name: Salesforce is customizable
pages.body: Admins can create custom fields, objects, and layouts so Salesforce fits each business’s unique needs.

pages.name: Reports turn data into answers
pages.body: Salesforce reports let you filter, group, and summarize records to uncover business trends.

pages.name: Chatter connects teams
pages.body: Salesforce Chatter is a built-in social network where employees share updates, files, and feedback.

pages.name: Marketing Cloud personalizes outreach
pages.body: Salesforce Marketing Cloud helps businesses send targeted emails, ads, and messages to the right audience.

pages.name: Service Cloud improves support
pages.body: Salesforce Service Cloud tracks cases, automates customer service, and powers chatbots for faster help.
